title: First Talking Film Released
description: 'The Jazz Singer' becomes the first feature-length movie with synchronized dialogue.

title: First Academy Awards
description: The first Oscars ceremony is held in Hollywood.

title: Release of Star Wars: A New Hope
description: George Lucas's space opera becomes a cultural phenomenon.

title: First Video Game Console Released
description: Magnavox Odyssey, the first home video game console, hits the market.

title: MTV Launches
description: Music Television (MTV) debuts with 'Video Killed the Radio Star' as its first video.

title: First Pokémon Game Released
description: Pokémon Red and Green debut in Japan, starting a worldwide craze.

title: Titanic Movie Released
description: James Cameron's blockbuster becomes one of the highest-grossing films of all time.

title: First Marvel Cinematic Universe Film Released
description: 'Iron Man' begins the now-iconic MCU series.

title: Release of Minecraft
description: The sandbox game becomes one of the best-selling video games in history.

title: Avengers: Endgame Released
description: The culmination of Marvel's Infinity Saga shatters box office records.
